title: vandu vandu
sahitya:
vandu vandu sholluginra vAzhvuminnalE undiyundit-taLLuginra pandu pOlumE


anupallavi

  antara malar ceNDADum Atma nAthanin AnandattilE shuzhalum anbaNukkUTTam


caraNam    inba tunba shuzhalADum inda vAzhvinai unparam enrIndEn ElAi Om shiva murugA sharaN Om param guhanE
